title: Step 1.1 RED: add CLI --help smoke test
description: Create failing test asserting tonic --help lists run/check/test/fmt/cache/verify

title: Step 1.2 GREEN: implement tonic command skeleton
description: Implement CLI routing and stable exit codes for run/check/test/fmt/cache/verify

title: Step 1.3 RED: verify fails when acceptance YAML missing
description: Add verify test that expects explicit missing-acceptance error

title: Step 1.4 GREEN: acceptance YAML loader + explicit error
description: Implement acceptance file loading and deterministic missing-file diagnostic

title: Step 1.5 RED: feature parser tags + scenario IDs
description: Add parser tests for @auto/@agent-manual/@human-manual tags and scenario IDs

title: Step 1.6 GREEN: minimal feature parsing + mode metadata
description: Implement feature file parsing and mode-selection metadata extraction

title: Step 1.7 REFACTOR: shared CLI diagnostics + acceptance utilities
description: Extract reusable diagnostics/parsing helpers without changing behavior

title: Step 1.8 RED: verify auto-mode integration emits pass/fail JSON
description: Add integration test for tonic verify run step-01 --mode auto that expects structured JSON status output after loading acceptance + feature fixtures

title: Step 1.9 GREEN: implement verify JSON status reporter
description: Implement tonic verify run success/failure JSON output contract for loaded acceptance + feature metadata

title: Step 2.1 RED: token golden test for minimal module fixture
description: Add an integration test for  expecting deterministic Elixir-inspired tokens for a tiny defmodule/def fixture.

title: Step 2.2 GREEN: baseline scanner for identifiers/literals
description: Implement minimal lexer + --dump-tokens check path for identifiers, keywords, literals, operators, and delimiters needed by the Step 2.1 fixture.

title: Step 2.3 RED: add operator/atom token golden test
description: Lock expected tonic check --dump-tokens stream for |>, ->, and :atom forms plus keyword coverage.

title: Step 2.4 GREEN: implement operator/atom lexer tokens
description: Extend scanner and dump labels for |>, ->, and :atom while preserving deterministic token stream.

title: Step 2.5 REFACTOR: unify lexer span handling + error reporting
description: Refactor scanner to track token spans and replace string errors with structured lexer diagnostics while preserving existing token dump behavior.

title: Step 3.1 RED: add parser AST dump golden test
description: Add an integration test for tonic check <file> --dump-ast using a single module with two functions and assert deterministic AST output contract.

title: Step 3.2 GREEN: implement module/function parser + --dump-ast
description: Implement parser support for defmodule + def functions and wire tonic check --dump-ast output to satisfy Step 3.1 golden contract.

title: Step 3.3 RED: expression AST golden for call nesting + precedence
description: Add failing integration test for tonic check --dump-ast that requires nested calls and infix precedence parsing.

title: Step 3.4 GREEN: implement expression parser precedence table
description: Implement parser support for nested call expressions and '+' precedence to satisfy AST golden.

title: Step 3.5 REFACTOR: stable AST node constructors
description: Add stable node IDs via parser constructors with tests while preserving dump-ast JSON contract.

title: Step 4.1 RED: pipe-chain AST golden
description: Add failing integration test for tonic check --dump-ast on a multi-stage pipe chain fixture with deterministic JSON contract.

title: Step 4.2 GREEN: parse pipe-chain expressions
description: Implement parser AST support for |> chains to satisfy Step 4.1 golden contract.

title: Step 4.3 RED: lock case pattern AST contract
description: Add failing integration golden for tuple/list/map patterns in case branches via tonic check --dump-ast.

title: Step 4.4 GREEN: implement case pattern parser variants
description: Implement parser support for case branches with tuple/list/map/wildcard/bind patterns to satisfy Step 4.3 golden.

title: Step 4.4 GREEN: implement case pattern parser variants
description: Implement parser support for case branches with tuple/list/map/wildcard/bind patterns to satisfy Step 4.3 golden.

title: Step 4.5 REFACTOR: normalize branch representation
description: Refactor parser AST to normalize case/cond branch shape for future type checking while preserving current dump-ast contract.

title: Step 5.1 RED: lock undefined symbol check diagnostic
description: Add failing integration test for tonic check deterministic undefined symbol resolver error contract.

title: Step 5.2 GREEN: implement local scope resolver baseline
description: Implement minimal resolver to detect undefined local symbols with deterministic diagnostic code.

title: Step 5.3 RED: add two-module resolver contract
description: Add failing integration test for cross-module resolution in a project directory fixture.

title: Step 5.4 GREEN: implement module graph + cross-module resolution
description: Teach tonic check to load project directories and resolve module-qualified cross-file calls.

title: Step 5.5 REFACTOR: centralize resolver diagnostics and codes
description: Consolidate resolver error codes/messages into a shared diagnostics module with stable constructors while preserving current CLI error contracts.

title: Step 6.1 RED: lock polymorphic helper inference contract
description: Add failing inference test for polymorphic-like helper used at concrete call sites before typing engine exists.

title: Step 6.2 GREEN: implement base type constraints + unification
description: Implement initial type inference for helper reuse at concrete call sites.

title: Step 6.3 RED: lock type mismatch diagnostic with spans
description: Add failing typing test requiring deterministic mismatch diagnostic code/message with source span offset.

title: Step 6.4 GREEN: implement mismatch diagnostics and coercion rejection
description: Implement type mismatch diagnostics (with spans) and reject implicit unsafe coercions.

title: Step 6.5 RED: lock explicit dynamic annotation policy
description: Add failing typing tests for explicit dynamic parameter annotations and deterministic rejection when dynamic annotation appears outside allowed parameter positions.

title: Step 6.6 GREEN: implement explicit dynamic annotation boundaries
description: Implement parser+typing support for explicit dynamic parameter annotations and reject disallowed annotation locations with deterministic diagnostics.

title: Step 7.1 RED: reject ? on non-Result expressions
description: Add a failing contract that tonic check reports deterministic typing diagnostics when the ? operator is used on a non-Result expression.

title: Step 7.2 GREEN: implement Result-aware ? typing rule
description: Implement lexer/parser/type-checking support for ? propagation so non-Result operands emit deterministic diagnostics and valid Result flows pass.

title: Step 7.3 RED: lock non-exhaustive case diagnostic contract
description: Add failing integration coverage that requires tonic check to reject a non-exhaustive case expression with deterministic diagnostics.

title: Step 7.4 GREEN: implement case exhaustiveness diagnostics
description: Implement v0 case exhaustiveness checking and deterministic error reporting for missing wildcard/coverage.

title: Step 7.5 REFACTOR: harmonize Result/match typing diagnostics
description: Centralize E3001/E3002 typing diagnostics so Result propagation and case exhaustiveness errors share one diagnostic surface with stable code/message accessors.

title: Step 8.1 RED: lock simple typed lowering IR snapshot
description: Add a failing contract for tonic check --dump-ir on a simple typed function to anchor Step 8 lowering behavior.

title: Step 8.2 GREEN: implement typed AST to core IR lowering for literals/calls
description: Introduce a minimal IR module and wire tonic check --dump-ir for simple function bodies (int/call) with stable JSON output.

title: Step 8.3 RED: lock IR snapshot contract for question + case
description: Add failing integration coverage for tonic check --dump-ir on a fixture that combines postfix ? with case branches, asserting deterministic IR JSON output.

title: Step 8.4 GREEN: implement IR lowering for Result question and case branches
description: Extend lowering and IR schema so tonic check --dump-ir handles Expr::Question and Expr::Case nodes per the Step 8.3 snapshot contract.

title: Step 8.5 REFACTOR: canonicalize IR call targets
description: Refactor IR call op shape so lowering emits explicit callee target kind (builtin vs function) to simplify Step 9 interpreter dispatch while keeping dump-ir deterministic.

title: Step 8.6 RED: lock IR source-map dump contract
description: Add failing snapshot coverage for tonic check --dump-ir requiring source offsets on lowered ops to preserve diagnostics mapping.

title: Step 8.7 GREEN: add IR op source offsets
description: Implement minimal source-map metadata in IR ops and wire lowering + dump snapshots.

title: Step 9.1 RED: add tonic run arithmetic smoke contract
description: Add integration test asserting tonic run executes a simple script and prints deterministic output.

title: Step 9.2 GREEN: implement minimal runtime evaluator + tonic run wiring
description: Execute lowered IR for literal/addition script and map CLI output/exit status.

title: Step 9.3 RED: lock tonic run Result propagation failure contract
description: Add failing integration test asserting tonic run propagates err(reason) from Demo.run and exits with deterministic runtime failure output.

title: Step 9.4 GREEN: implement runtime err propagation + run exit mapping
description: Teach runtime evaluator to execute ok/err/question semantics and map propagated err(reason) to tonic run failure exit behavior.

title: Step 9.5 REFACTOR: reduce runtime call/value allocation churn
description: Refactor runtime call evaluation to avoid per-function-call arg Vec allocation and remove builtin value cloning while preserving run Result semantics.

title: Step 10.1 RED: map/tuple/keyword runtime behavior contract
description: Add failing runtime contract test(s) for tonic run over tuple/map/keyword constructors to lock expected output semantics for Step 10 core data model.

title: Step 10.2 GREEN: implement tuple/map/keyword runtime constructors
description: Implement minimal tuple/map/keyword value model plus builtin constructors and rendering to satisfy Step 10.1 runtime contract tests.

title: Step 10.3 RED: add protocol dispatch smoke contract
description: Add failing tonic run integration test asserting protocol-style dispatch over tuple/map values to lock Step 10.3 behavior.

title: Step 10.4 GREEN: implement protocol dispatch tables
description: Implement minimal protocol declaration/dispatch path so protocol-style calls dispatch for tuple/map concrete runtime values.

title: Step 10.5 RED: add pipe + Enum run fixture contract
description: Add an integration test locking tonic run behavior for a pipe chain that routes through Enum-style module functions over protocol-backed collection values.

title: Step 10.6 GREEN: implement pipe execution for Enum-style chains
description: Implement pipe semantics through resolver/typing/lowering/runtime so chained Enum-style module calls execute and satisfy the new run fixture contract.

title: Step 11.1 RED: add tonic.toml manifest validation contract
description: Add a failing integration test that runs tonic against a project root and expects a deterministic manifest validation error when project.entry is missing.

title: Step 11.2 GREEN: implement manifest model + project-root run loading
description: Implement tonic.toml parsing/validation and run-path project-root handling so tonic run <dir> loads project.entry source.

title: Step 11.3 RED: add multi-module project run fixture
description: Add failing integration test asserting tonic run . loads project module graph so Demo.run can call Math.helper from sibling module file.

title: Step 11.4 GREEN: implement project module graph loader
description: Load additional project modules for tonic run project paths so cross-file module-qualified calls resolve at runtime.

title: Step 11.5 RED: lock lazy stdlib load tracing contract
description: Add integration contract for tonic run debug module-load tracing proving optional stdlib modules are not loaded unless referenced.

title: Step 11.6 GREEN: implement lazy stdlib module loading
description: Implement stdlib optional module lazy loading with debug trace output in tonic run; load optional modules on demand only.

title: Step 12.1 RED: cache hit/miss key contract
description: Add failing cache unit tests for synthetic cache keys and lookup miss/hit expectations before cache implementation.

title: Step 12.2 GREEN: implement cache key + storage interface
description: Implement on-disk cache key derivation and lookup/store interface to satisfy synthetic hit/miss tests.

title: Step 12.3 RED: lock repeated-run cache hit contract
description: Add integration test proving second tonic run of same project emits cache hit (with first run miss) under debug trace.

title: Step 12.4 GREEN: wire run pipeline to on-disk cache
description: Implement persistent cache lookup/store and debug hit/miss trace so repeated runs reuse compiled artifacts.

title: Step 12.5 RED: cache corruption fallback contract
description: Add integration coverage proving tonic run falls back to compile path when cached IR artifact is corrupted.

title: Step 12.6 GREEN: corrupted-cache fallback implementation
description: Implement deterministic cache corruption fallback behavior and tracing in tonic run cache pipeline.

title: Fix clippy never_loop in check command arg parsing
description: cargo clippy --all-targets fails in src/main.rs:98 (for-loop that immediately returns). Replace with non-loop single-arg check and re-run clippy.

title: [P2] Step 13.1 RED: lock check/test/fmt command integration contracts
description: Add integration tests for tonic check/test/fmt command paths and output/exit contracts as the first Step 13 RED gate.

title: [P2] Step 13.2 GREEN: implement check/test/fmt command paths
description: Implement missing tonic check/test/fmt behavior and stable output contracts required by the Step 13 command integration suite.

title: [P2] Step 13.3 RED: verify mode tag-filtering contracts
description: Add integration coverage asserting tonic verify run filters scenarios by mode tags (@auto/@agent-manual/@human-manual) for auto, mixed, and manual modes.

title: [P2] Step 13.4 GREEN: implement verify mode tag filtering
description: Implement verify runner filtering so auto includes @auto only, mixed includes @auto/@agent-manual, and manual includes all required tags in stable JSON output.

title: [P2] Step 13.5 RED: lock benchmark gate threshold contract
description: Add integration coverage proving tonic verify run step-13 fails when benchmark metrics exceed configured cold/warm/rss thresholds and reports benchmark status metadata.

title: [P2] Step 13.6 GREEN: implement benchmark threshold enforcement
description: Implement benchmark gate parsing/enforcement in verify run so threshold failures set non-zero exit and structured benchmark status in JSON output.

title: [P2] Step 13.7 RED: lock manual-evidence requirement contract
description: Add integration coverage proving tonic verify run step-13 --mode mixed fails when required agent-manual evidence JSON is missing.

title: [P2] Step 13.8 GREEN: enforce manual-evidence requirements in verify
description: Implement verify-run evidence checks so mixed/manual modes fail with deterministic diagnostics/report metadata when required evidence JSON files are missing.
